Question.Subject: Is this a legit seller for me to buy this game?
Question.Content:
http://www.amazon.com/Grand-Theft-Auto-San-Andreas/dp/B001IVC4UE/ref=sr_1_11?ie=UTF8&s=videogames&qid=1268102123&sr=1-11
It looked a little suspicious. Opinions.
Question.ChosenAnswer: yeah maybe the used ones probably don't work or have crazy scratches on 'em, safest is to pay through paypal I know for ebay if the product is not what is described they refund your money or give u another one no extra charge. its called buyer protection doesn't look like amazon has it.

Answer.Content: I'm not sure but amazon is usually ok

yeah maybe the used ones probably don't work or have crazy scratches on 'em, safest is to pay through paypal I know for ebay if the product is not what is described they refund your money or give u another one no extra charge. its called buyer protection doesn't look like amazon has it.
